subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In Week 2 in this season, Reggie Bush returned a punt 55 yards for a score; Darren Sproles of San Diego ran back a kickoff 103 yards; and two other punts were recovered for touchdowns.
snippet: In Week 2 in this season, Reggie Bush returned a punt 55 yards for a score; Darren Sproles of San Diego ran back a kickoff 103 yards; and two other punts were recovered for touchdowns.
